title: Events: Managing Ticket Types
body:
Events: Managing Ticket Types¶

Ticket Types displays the details of the event’s ticket types - name, status, price, ticket availability, and time period of availability.
To view this feature, you must have navigated to an event. Refer to Events if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Ticket Types

  2. Click and Edit Ticket Type to edit the ticket type

  3. Click and Activate Ticket Type or Deactivate Ticket Type to perform associated action

  4. Click in the upper right hand corner to create a new ticket type
toc: • Events: Managing Ticket Types
